inclusion.criterion: NAFLD diagnosis based on non-invasive assessment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: alcohol consumption > 21 standard drinks per week in men or >14 standard drinks per week in women over at least a two-year period
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Wilson disease, which is an exclusion criterion. However, the patient's liver condition is likely due to NAFLD, making them eligible for the trial.
